settings.heading: Tennis Flex League Winners
settings.description: Compete in Tennis Flex Leagues to qualify for the City Championships! Think you’re the best player in your local league? Play in at least two sessions and qualify for an end-of-season playoff tournament for additional matches, prizes, and, of course, bragging rights.

settings.heading: City Championships
settings.list: At the end of each session, players who finish in the top two of their division will compete against opponents within the same UTR point (i.e. 4.0-4.99) to become a City Champion at their level
settings.list2: The first City Championship will take place immediately after session four
settings.list3: Players will be put into four-person brackets
settings.list4: Compete for bragging rights and memorabilia

settings.heading: Play in a tennis flex league near you
settings.description-title: Compete in Tennis Flex Leagues to qualify for the end-of-season playoffs and win prizes! Players who win their division compete against each other.

settings.heading: Play in a tennis flex league near you
settings.description-title: Compete in Tennis Flex Leagues to qualify for the end-of-season playoffs and win prizes! Players who win their division compete against each other.

settings.description: Flex Leagues has been a great way to work on groundstrokes in a competitive environment while still offering casual, social play.
settings.author: Maureen

settings.description: I love Flex Leagues because of the caliber of matches and the players I get to meet. The rating creates good competition and great quality matchups!
settings.author: Daniel

settings.description: Flex Leagues are a great way to connect with local players and improve my game.
settings.author: Leilani

settings.description: My private club doesn't offer me the same range of players to hit against. Now I'm forced to come up with different strategies to use.
settings.author: Stewart

settings.description: I've met new friends and am addicted to watching my rating update each date!
settings.author: Dario

settings.heading: Testimonials
settings.sub-heading: Why they love us for tennis flex leagues...

settings.heading: JOIN UTR Sports
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you with the UTR Sports app.
